comment.author: 41306854@N00
comment._content:
RT8 type, delivered Nov 1951
The woman in trousers on front of the bus is the conductoress. Her ticket machine is strapped on her chest, she's also wearing a badge with her public transport employee's number.

comment.author: 36844288@N00
comment._content: Great shot - Victoria bus station - and LYR 588 was RT 3369, scrapped finally in 1971. The two RTs on the left are 'roof box' bodied, with the route number blinds on the dome - the others are the later variants with the 3-part destination blinds including the number.
